summary:
Adds a somewhat lore-friendly armor to your Skyrim. Craftable and upgradeable.
Dragonborn DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i6.minus.com/jIA2vRHWbzPsY.jpg[/img]


[font=Times New Roman][size=6][u]VAYAN ARMOR
[/u][/size][/font][font=Times New Roman]by tschutschi


[size=5][color=#ff0000]Update 16. Jan 2015: v1.02 added[/color]
[/size]- fixed clipping issues
- alternate fur boots
- bodyslide files
- now needs "advanced armors" perk
- [color=#ff0000]Option B added[/color]; different shape, slightly bigger breasts



[img]http://i2.minus.com/jYRI7WwDlwxIz.jpg[/img]
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Description[/color]
[img]http://i2.minus.com/jYRI7WwDlwxIz.jpg[/img]

[/size][size=3]This mod adds a somewhat lore-friendly light armor to your Skyrim.
It is craftable (steel section) and upgradeable. It requires the advanced armors smithing perk to craft.
This is my first mashup i'm releasing, so be kind. If you like it, why not hit the endorse button?!
The armor consists of 3 parts: Cuirass, Gauntlets and Boots. 

How to get it ingame:
- Craft it at any forge
- Buy it from Moth Gro-Bagol, the castle blacksmith from Markarth (In Understone Keep)
- Add it using the console (type "help vayan" to see the ID)

Please leave your feedback in the comment section and don't hesitate to upload some screenshots!


[img]http://i3.minus.com/iyxAylvCviHuw.jpg[/img]

[/size][/font][size=3][/size][font=Times New Roman][size=5][img]http://i2.minus.com/jYRI7WwDlwxIz.jpg[/img]
[color=#b6b6b6]Requirements[/color]
[img]http://i2.minus.com/jYRI7WwDlwxIz.jpg[/img]

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]Skyrim (duh)
[b]!! Dragonborn DLC  !![/b]
Functioning brain
